title: shankarAbharaNa shayanuDadE
sahitya:
shankarAbharaNa shayanuDadE ghana shyAmala gEhuDananta sundaruDu


anupallavi

  pankaja mukhamentO vikasincE santasincenO nA manavini vini


caraNam    angamuna nunna ramA lalAma AshincenO muraLI ni nAdamu 
shankara mauLI sapta haya rathikuDu sammukhamuna velige lOcanamulai
